I have a UT that does some stuff in another thread.  The threaded code 
assserts several things, while the UT waits.  After the wait() call 
ends, is there anyway to have the TestCase check and see if an assertion 
has already "failed"  from another thread and quit processing, or do I 
have to roll that logic myself?

David
